---
title: ucpc.presets
supports: ["0.1.0"]
---

This is a module that predefines expressions mainly used in algorithm competitions.

## difficulties

**General**
```typst
difficulties.easy
difficulties.normal
difficulties.hard
difficulties.challenging
```

**solved.ac Difficulty Tiers**
```typst
difficulties.bronze
difficulties.silver
difficulties.gold
difficulties.platinum
difficulties.diamond
difficulties.ruby
```
